item.title: Liz add a quote by Sarah Rees Brennan
item.description: "In two words," said Alan quietly, "there is nothing I love half as much as you." -- Sarah Rees Brennan

item.title: Liz add a quote by Libba Bray
item.description: "And that is how change happens. One gesture. One person. One moment at a time." -- Libba Bray

item.title: Liz add a quote by Philip Pullman
item.description: "because he's Will" -- Philip Pullman

item.title: Liz add a quote by Terry Goodkind
item.description: "The sun has already set on the days we made those choices. We must concentrate on what we can do tomorrow; we can't relive yesterday." -- Terry Goodkind

item.title: Liz add a quote by Philip Pullman
item.description: "...But it gradually seemed to me that I'd made myself believe something that wasn't true. I'd made myself believe that I was fine and happy and fulfilled on my own without the love of anyone else. Being in love was like China: you knew it was there, and no doubt it was very interesting, and some people went there, but I never would. I'd spend all my life without ever going to China, but it wouldn't matter, because there was all the rest of the world to visit... And I thought: am I really going to spend the rest of my life without feeling that again? I thought: I <i>want</i> to go to China. It's full of treasures and strangeness and mysteries and joy." -- Philip Pullman

item.title: Liz add a quote by Terry Goodkind
item.description: "People are stupid. They will believe a lie because they want to believe it's true, or because they are afraid it might be true." -- Terry Goodkind

item.title: Liz add a quote by Terry Goodkind
item.description: "If the road is easy, you're likely going the wrong way." -- Terry Goodkind

item.title: Liz add a quote by Joss Whedon
item.description: "Passion. It lies in all of us. Sleeping... waiting... and though unwanted, unbidden, it will stir... open its jaws and howl. It speaks to us... guides us. Passion rules us all. And we obey. What other choice do we have? Passion is the source of our finest moments. The joy of love... the clarity of hatred... the ecstasy of grief. It hurts sometimes more than we can bear. If we could live without passion, maybe we'd know some kind of peace. But we would be hollow. Empty rooms, shuttered and dank. Without passion, we'd be truly dead." -- Joss Whedon

item.title: Liz add a quote by Jeaniene Frost
item.description: "I'm saying that I'm a moody, insecure, narrow-minded, jealous, borderline homicidal bitch, and I want you to promise me that you're okay with that, because it's who I am, and you're what I need." -- Jeaniene Frost

item.title: Liz add a quote by Richelle Mead
item.description: "You will lose what you value most, so treasure it while you can." -- Richelle Mead

item.title: Liz add a quote by Sara Gruen
item.description: "When you are five, you know your age down to the month. Even in your twenties, you know how old you are. I'm twenty-three you say, or maybe twenty-seven. But then in your thirties, something strange starts to happen. It is a mere hiccup at first, an instant of hesitation. How old are you? Oh, I'm--you start confidently, but then you stop. You were going to say thirty-three, but you are not. You're thirty-five. And then you're bothered, because you wonder if this is the beginning of the end. It is, of course, but it's decades before you admit it." -- Sara Gruen

item.title: Liz add a quote by John Green
item.description: "Saying 'I notice you're a nerd' is like saying, 'Hey, I notice that you'd rather be intelligent than be stupid, that you'd rather be thoughtful than be vapid, that you believe that there are things that matter more than the arrest record of Lindsay Lohan. Why is that?' In fact, it seems to me that most contemporary insults are pretty lame. Even 'lame' is kind of lame. Saying 'You're lame' is like saying 'You walk with a limp.' Yeah, whatever, so does 50 Cent, and he's done all right for himself." -- John Green

item.title: Liz add a quote by John Green
item.description: "Books are the ultimate Dumpees: put them down and they’ll wait for you forever; pay attention to them and they always love you back." -- John Green

item.title: Liz add a quote by Richelle Mead
Liz add a quote by Richelle Mead
item.description: "Yeah? Can you draw a skeleton riding a motorcycle with flames coming out of it? And I want a pirate hat on the skeleton. And a parrot on his shoulder. A skeleton parrot. Or maybe a ninja skeleton parrot? No, that would be overkill. But it'd be cool if the biker skeleton could be shooting some ninja throwing stars. That are on fire." -- Richelle Mead

item.title: Liz add a quote by Sarah Rees Brennan
item.description: "My life was going to flash before my eyes, but it decided to hide behind my eyes and quake with terror instead." -- Sarah Rees Brennan

item.title: Liz add a quote by Sarah Rees Brennan
item.description: "The word 'home', it seemed, once learned, was a hard one to forget." -- Sarah Rees Brennan

item.title: Liz add a quote by Suzanne Collins
item.description: "Well, don't expect us to be too impressed. We just saw Finnick Odair in his underwear." -- Suzanne Collins

item.title: Liz add a quote by Veronica Roth
item.description: "We believe in ordinary acts of bravery, in the courage that drives one person to stand up for another." -- Veronica Roth

item.title: Liz add a quote by Richelle Mead
item.description: "You're in an awfully good mood," he observed. "Was there a sale at Khakis-R-Us?" -- Richelle Mead

item.title: Liz add a quote by Sarah Rees Brennan
item.description: "I am in full possession of the amazing power of being sarcastic." -- Sarah Rees Brennan

item.title: Liz add a quote by Sarah Rees Brennan
item.description: "Real life is sometimes boring, rarely conclusive and boy, does the dialogue need work." -- Sarah Rees Brennan

item.title: Liz add a quote by Sarah Rees Brennan
item.description: "Your soul is like the souls of a thousand monkeys on crack, all smushed together." -- Sarah Rees Brennan

item.title: Liz add a quote by Sarah Rees Brennan
item.description: "Fear's useless. Either something bad happens or it doesn't: If it doesn't, you've wasted time being afraid, and if it does, you've wasted time that you could have spent sharpening your weapons." -- Sarah Rees Brennan

item.title: Liz add a quote by Sarah Rees Brennan
item.description:
"I'm told I have the body of a god."
"A Greek god, or one of those gods with the horse heads or elephant's legs coming out of their chests?" Alan asked. "Next time someone tells you that, ask them to specify." -- Sarah Rees Brennan

item.title: Liz add a quote by Sarah Rees Brennan
item.description: "Not really a party until someone brings the surprise zombies." -- Sarah Rees Brennan

item.title: Liz add a quote by Sarah Rees Brennan
item.description: "If I wasn't going to be a world-famous journalist and if I didn't have such respect for truth and justice, I could be an amazing master criminal." -- Sarah Rees Brennan

item.title: Liz add a quote by Gayle Forman
item.description: "I realize now that dying is easy. Living is hard." -- Gayle Forman

item.title: Liz add a quote by Sarah Rees Brennan
item.description: "I have a serious girls’ night question for you,” said Kami. “I know you’re new to this, but I will require an answer quickly. Are you prepared to eat at least five éclairs tonight?" -- Sarah Rees Brennan

item.title: Liz add a quote by Sarah Rees Brennan
item.description:
"She clenched her fist in his T-shirt, put her other arm around those too-broad, too-real shoulders. When he tried to pull away, she held on tight. Kami felt the surrender in his mind a moment before he laid his face in the curve of her neck. The whole world was so real it hurt.
Kami whispered into Jared's hair, "I'm always on your side." -- Sarah Rees Brennan
